verbs.description: [ARG1: Former Deputy Assistant General Harry Litman] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on MSNBC] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss Donald Trump 's legal issues and everything surrounding it] .
